entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:45 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
